title: Bug 18705: Too much flashing in Control Example
description: The Control Example is experiencing excessive flashing.
OB: When running the Control Example and resizing the window in the vertical direction only, all tabs in the TabFolder and all Frames flash.
EB: Only the bottom edge of the outermost frames should be repainted to prevent excessive flashing.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Run the Control Example. 2. Resize the window in the vertical direction only. 3. Notice that all tabs in the TabFolder and all Frames flash.
